form.validUserName: User name includes only character and number.
form.validPassword: Password includes only character and number.
form.validCode: Code includes only character and number.
form.duplicates: This field can not be duplicates.
form.dateRange: The date must be between {{from}} to {{to}}.
form.minDate: Begin date must be greater than or equal to {{from}}.
form.minDeadline: Shipment date must be greater than or equal to {{from}}.
form.maxDate: End date must be less than or equal to {{to}}.
form.maxDateBigger: End date must be greater than or equal to {{from}}.
form.biggerThanMinDate: Start date must be greater than {{from}}.
form.smallerThanMaxDate: End date must be less than {{to}}.
form.invalidDateRange: Start date must be less than end date.
form.greaterThanZero: This field must be graeter than 0.
form.invalidTimeRange: End time must be greater than start time.
form.invalidTimeStart: Start time of next shift must equal to end time of previous shift.
